mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ordersDetail (name, price, colorType, goodsId, cartsId, count, imp, username, purchaseDate) SELECT name, price, colorType, goodsId, cartsId, count, imp, username, purchaseDate FROM ( SELECT g.name, g.price, g.colorType, g.id AS goodsId, MIN(c.id) AS cartsId, COUNT(c.goods_id) AS count, o.imp, c.username, MIN(o.purchaseDate) AS purchaseDate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY g.id ORDER BY MIN(o.purchaseDate) DESC) AS rn FROM cart c JOIN goods g ON g.id = c.goods_id JOIN orders o ON o.username = c.username WHERE c.username = #{username} GROUP BY g.name, g.price, g.colorType, g.id, c.username, o.imp ) AS subquery WHERE rn = 1;
mapper.select: select name,price,count from ordersDetail where username = #{username} and imp = #{imp}
